actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations, S. Rept. 93-471.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Organizations Immunities Act to authorize the President to extend certain privileges and immunities to the Organization of African Unity.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to extend certain privileges and immunities to the Organization of African Unity under the International Organizations Immunities Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Organizations Immunities Act to authorize the President to extend certain privileges and immunities to the Organization of African Unity.
